程序包的使用
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding

  • 使用org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client
    Provides HBase Client Table of Contents Overview Example API Usage Overview To administer HBase, create and drop tables, list and alter tables, use Admin.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile
    Provides implementations of HFile and HFile BlockCache.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce
    Provides HBase MapReduce Input/OutputFormats, a table indexing MapReduce job, and utility methods.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding中的类 
    类和说明
    DataBlockEncoding
    Provide access to all data block encoding algorithms.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding中的类 
    类和说明
    DataBlockEncoding
    Provide access to all data block encoding algorithms.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding中的类 
    类和说明
    AbstractDataBlockEncoder 
    AbstractDataBlockEncoder.AbstractEncodedSeeker 
    BufferedDataBlockEncoder
    Base class for all data block encoders that use a buffer.
    BufferedDataBlockEncoder.SeekerState 
    CompressionState
    Stores the state of data block encoder at the beginning of new key.
    DataBlockEncoder
    Encoding of KeyValue.
    DataBlockEncoder.EncodedSeeker
    An interface which enable to seek while underlying data is encoded.
    DataBlockEncoding
    Provide access to all data block encoding algorithms.
    DiffKeyDeltaEncoder.DiffCompressionState 
    EncoderBufferTooSmallException
    Internal error which indicates a bug in a data block encoding algorithm.
    EncodingState
    Keeps track of the encoding state.
    FastDiffDeltaEncoder.FastDiffCompressionState 
    HFileBlockDecodingContext
    A decoding context that is created by a reader's encoder, and is shared across the reader's all read operations.
    HFileBlockDefaultDecodingContext
    A default implementation of HFileBlockDecodingContext.
    HFileBlockDefaultEncodingContext
    A default implementation of HFileBlockEncodingContext.
    HFileBlockEncodingContext
    An encoding context that is created by a writer's encoder, and is shared across the writer's whole lifetime.
    NoneEncoder 
    RowIndexEncoderV1 
    RowIndexSeekerV1.SeekerState 
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding中的类

    An interface which enable to seek while underlying data is encoded.

    Keeps track of the encoding state.

    A decoding context that is created by a reader's encoder, and is shared across the reader's all read operations.
    HFileBlockDefaultDecodingContext
    A default implementation of HFileBlockDecodingContext.
    HFileBlockDefaultEncodingContext
    A default implementation of HFileBlockEncodingContext.
    HFileBlockEncodingContext
    An encoding context that is created by a writer's encoder, and is shared across the writer's whole lifetime.
